title: mati mayakkam
sahitya:
mati mayakkam EnO manamE karuNAnidhiyAna muruga nAthan irukkaiyil


anupallavi

  tudi sheidE nI avan tuNai tanaik-kOrinAl gatiyaLittE unnaik-kAttarauL kUruvAn


caraNam    aDiyArai anbuDanAdarittaruLvAn noDi nErattil avar iDar tIrttu viDuvAn
cintai tuDittiDa nondu tanniDam vandOrukk-abhayam tandu tAngi viDuvAn
